about_the_game:
This is an adult visual novel series featuring a stunning red-haired futanari as the protagonist. In this episode, she goes on a date at a bar.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Kira was relaxing in her living room when she got a surprise text from Evelyn, one of her exes.
Eager for some fun and in the mood for drinks, she decided to say yes.
At the bar, Misty, the cute bartender, made sure Kira had a few rounds before her date arrived.
Things took an unexpected turn when Misty found Kira in the wrong restroom and pulled her aside, curious about her big secret.
How will Misty react to this revelation? And will Evelyn show up on time?
Play our game to find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders
- Image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
All characters depicted are 18 years old and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains straight sex scenes.
Sexual scenes involving transgender characters.

name: Futanari Sex Adventures - Episode 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
